scripts.package:win: electron-packager . PokeRogue --overwrite --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=dist --icon=icons/PR --extra-resource=update-game.js --extra-resource=update-game.bat && echo @echo off > "dist\PokeRogue-win32-x64\PokeRogue Offline.bat" && echo start "" ".\PokeRogue.exe" --offline >> "dist\PokeRogue-win32-x64\PokeRogue Offline.bat"
scripts.package:linux: electron-packager . PokeRogue --overwrite --platform=linux --arch=x64 --out=dist --icon=icons/PR --extra-resource=update-game.js --extra-resource=update-game.sh && echo '#!/bin/sh' > "dist/PokeRogue-linux-x64/PokeRogue Offline.sh" && echo './PokeRogue --offline' >> "dist/PokeRogue-linux-x64/PokeRogue Offline.sh" && chmod +x "dist/PokeRogue-linux-x64/PokeRogue Offline.sh"
scripts.package:mac: electron-packager . PokeRogue --overwrite --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --out=dist --icon=icons/PR --extra-resource=update-game.js --extra-resource=update-game.command && echo '#!/bin/sh' > "dist/PokeRogue-darwin-x64/PokeRogue Offline.command" && echo './PokeRogue.app/Contents/MacOS/PokeRogue --offline' >> "dist/PokeRogue-darwin-x64/PokeRogue Offline.command" && chmod +x "dist/PokeRogue-darwin-x64/PokeRogue Offline.command"
